name: Order Core
desc: Order Core is a military modspec that enhances a ship's combat and logistical capabilities by increasing ground support by %s, extending ballistic and energy weapon range by %s while extending point-defense range by %s, improving fleet mobility with a %s boost to maximum burn level, raising maintenance crew requirements by %s, and reducing the ordnance cost of large ballistic weapons by %s.
short: Order Core is a military modspec that enhances combat and logistics, boosting ground support, weapon range, fleet mobility, and reducing large ballistic ordnance costs while increasing crew requirements.

name: Principles Core
desc: The Principles Core is an experimental hullmod that enhances a ship's combat capabilities across multiple aspects. It increases ballistic and energy ammo reserves by %s, expands missile capacity by %s, and prolongs peak performance time by %s. Combat readiness degradation is reduced by %s, while solar shielding minimizes environmental hazards by %s. Defensive systems are reinforced, reducing energy damage taken by %s, improving shield turn rate by %s, and accelerating shield deployment by %s. Additionally, turret gyros are refined, enhancing turret rotation speed by %s, ensuring superior precision in battle.
short: Principles Core enhances ship endurance, firepower, and defenses boosting ammo reserves, missile capacity, shields, and turret response for peak combat efficiency.
